      • conjureSegueController

        public static void conjureSegueController(java.lang.String scope)

        Creates the SegueController set for the given implementation scope. The implementation scope specifies which version of implementations to use.

        Parameters:
        scope - The implementation scope

      • vanishController

        public static void vanishController(android.app.Activity activity)

        Destroys the constructed Controller for the given Activity.

        Parameters:
        activity - The given Activity

      • registerForControllerBus

      • activityLifecycleCallbacks

        public static android.app.Application.ActivityLifecycleCallbacks activityLifecycleCallbacks()

        Retrieves the Application.ActivityLifecycleCallbacks that binds Prestige to the Activity lifecycles so that it can conjure Controllers behind the curtains.

        Returns:
        The Prestige callbacks

      • materialize

        public static void materialize(android.app.Application application,
               java.lang.String scope)

        Materializes Prestige for the given scope and binds it to the Activity lifecycles in the given Application. This is equivalent to how you would use conjureSegueController(String) and activityLifecycleCallbacks() in most cases.

        Parameters:
        application - The application using Prestige
        scope - The implementation scope

      • attachPresentationFragment

        public static void attachPresentationFragment(android.app.Activity activity,
                              android.app.Fragment fragment)

        Attaches the given Presentation Fragment to the Controller for the give Presentation.

        It is recommended to do this in Activity.onAttachFragment(Fragment).

      • storeController

        public static void storeController(android.app.Activity activity)

        public static void injectModels(java.lang.Object target)
